import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { }

Explanations:

Country: Included: Expected:y Tip Amount: Who Gets It:
The name of the country. Is the tip included in the bill. Is it expected of you to leave a tip, other than what is included. What tip amount is normal in this country. Who gets the tip you leave.
